summary: When a lonely, unappreciated farm equipment salesman discovers he has only a few weeks to live, he withdraws his savings for a final holiday at a "posh" resort.
cast: Alec Guinness|Beatrice Campbell|Kay Walsh|Grégoire Aslan|Jean Colin|Muriel George|Brian Worth|Esma Cannon|Bernard Lee|Sidney James|Campbell Cotts|Moultrie Kelsall|Eveline Kirkwood-Hackett|Wilfrid Hyde-White|Eric Maturin|Helen Cherry|Harry Hutchinson|Hal Osmond|Brian Oulton|Ernest Thesiger|Heather Wilde|Ronald Simpson|Arthur Howard|Meier Tzelniker|Leslie Weston|Lockwood West|David McCallum Sr.|John Charlesworth|Alexander Field|Peter Jones|Charles Lloyd Pack|Raymond Rollett
title: Las últimas vacaciones
